transArray.content:
I came to Beijing for a short two-night stay and had a very good experience. The room is not big but fully equipped, clean and bright. The hotel's breakfast is rich in variety and tastes very good. When ordering takeout, a small robot will help deliver it. Before I left, I wanted to weigh my suitcase, so the sister at the front desk brought me a scale from her dormitory. Thank you very much.
All in all, it was a great experience and I will stay here again next time I have the chance!

fully equipped
Hygiene: clean and tidy
Service: great
Thank you for your recognition. We will continue to provide a warm and comfortable stay environment and warm and thoughtful service to our customers. Welcome to come again.
